name: I'll be a LIVING GOD
description:
Help the Old Man defeat death with as many unprescrited drugs as his body can handle!

COMMANDS

Arrow Keys to move the blocks

DEVELOPMENT

I couldn't finish the game in time during the Compo/Jam time frame and I ended up losing interest in finishing it as time kept going, but I decided to make it viable and upload it in the Extra category. Therefore, there are some missing sounds and there may be occasional bugs with blocks getting stuck.

CREDITS

A big thanks to Gabriele Congiu, aka gc00, for his wonderful work on the background music!

I wrote the game using the Godot engine and I created the art using Piskel. Sounds were  obtained from random stuff around me and recorded using a cellphone.

Created for Ludum Dare 50
